value:
The Loptr Church's laws are
clear. They will not suffer a traitor.
It's a miracle that I was saved.

They would burn you at the stake
if they discovered you were a
follower of the Loptr faith.$k$pBelievers were forced to flee to
the desert and hide underground.

It's time for a shift change. I'll go
stand watch.

Evil is everywhere. But evil by
itself has no power. People can
choose not to follow that path.

Nighttime can be dangerous. Watch
out for yourself, and get some rest.

Oh... I'm Salem. I'm an acquaintance
of $Nf.

All those who stand with us, draw
your swords! Evil will not have
its way!
To your rest.

Who am I meant to be? What is
my purpose?

Who you are should not be determined
based on a single choice you make.
I think I have to believe that.

I am Salem. I was once a priest of
Loptr, but I have chosen a new path.

It's said that the Loptr Church is an
evil group that worships the dark god
Loptous, but it isn't that simple.$k$pThe church's founder, Bishop Gair,
destroyed Grann and established
the Loptr Church and empire.$k$pThere are those who wish to revive
the empire, to take revenge on the
12 crusaders who brought it down.$k$pThe church, the empire... They were
things I could believe in at a time
when all I knew was poverty.$k$pIn time, it stopped making sense, so I
ran away.$k$pPlease understand—not everyone in
the church is an enemy of the world.
はあっ
これなら…
うっ…
手強い…
It is all right now.
Begone!
Turn from wickedness.
To your rest.
I have no regrets...
Chuckle...
I am Salem. I was once a priest of Loptr, but I have embarked on a different path.
Ah. I am not yet used to your humor.
The Loptr Church will not suffer a traitor. That is law.
The church no longer made sense to me. I can tell you no more.
Perne is a thief but he is not wicked. As long as that holds true, he has my aid.
Sara can wield the Kia Staff... She is Archbishop Manfroy's granddaughter, so it is no surprise.
I do not yet fully understand you. But for now, I will join you. I do not have much choice, do I?
Very well.
What now?
It will be done.
